select * from(SELECT id, user_id, title, content, regDate, hit, type, LEAD(id,1,9999) OVER(ORDER BY id) AS next, LAG(id,1,9999) OVER(ORDER BY id) AS prev, LEAD(TITLE,1,'다음글이 없습니다.') OVER(ORDER BY id) AS nextTitle, LAG(TITLE,1,'이전글이 없습니다.') OVER(ORDER BY id) AS prevTitle, secret, board_pw
FROM board order by id DESC) as b WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(user_id, title, content,type,regDate,board_pw,secret) VALUES (#{board.user_id}, #{board.title}, #{board.content},#{board.type}, #{board.regDate},#{board.board_pw},#{board.secret})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET user_id=#{board.user_id}, title=#{board.title}, content=#{board.content}, type =#{board.type}, hit=#{board.hit}, regDate=#{board.regDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board WHERE( type=#{type} and title like #{search} )or ( type =#{type} and content like #{search} ) or(type =#{type} and user_id like #{search} )
